Profiles

Models

class profiles.models.Profile(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Profile model extending the default User model. Each user can have one profile, represented by the one-to-one relationship between User and Profile. Returns:

str: A string representation of the model, which is the username of the associated user.

exception DoesNotExist
exception MultipleObjectsReturned

Views

profiles.views.index(request)[source]

View to display a list of all profiles. Fetches all the Profile objects and sends them to the ‘profiles/index.html’ template for rendering. Args:

request: The incoming HTTP request.

Returns:

HttpResponse object with the rendered template and the context containing the profiles list.

profiles.views.profile(request, username)[source]

View to display a specific profile based on the provided username. Fetches a Profile object based on the provided username and sends it to the ‘profiles/profile.html’ template for rendering. Args:

request: The incoming HTTP request. username (str): The username of the profile to be fetched.

Returns:

HttpResponse object with the rendered template and the context containing the specific profile.

Tests

class profiles.tests.ProfileViewsTestCase(methodName='runTest')[source]

Test cases for profile views and models. Every test assert the correct status code and the template used.

setUp()[source]

Hook method for setting up the test fixture before exercising it.
